Articles.Content:
Description

Double ring space station is your science outpost and refueling stop in orbit. Download includes .craft file for whole station and 2 .craft files for station split in two parts (top ring with soloar panels and down ring with propolution module) prepared for launch (with enough dV to bring it KGO, Mun, Duna, Eve, Laythe, etc.). I personally have this station at Kerbin stationary orbit over KSC.

Tech info

Parts count: 370

Crew: 36 kerbals

dV capacity: ~1,500 m/s

Docking ports: 6 Large, 4 medium

Action groups

1 - toggle jet engine

2 - toggle solar panels

3 - toggle antenas

Images

Javascript is disabled. View full album

DOWNLOAD Craft files
